summary: A drama revolving around characters whose lives are transformed one summer at an exclusive East Coast country club.
cast: Mason Gamble|Gary Sinise|Philip Baker Hall|Dylan Baker|Henry Simmons|Ellen Muth|Brian Doyle-Murray|David Zayas|Kevin Thoms|Michael Della Femina|Robin Dorian|Linda Emond|Justin Goncalves|Greg Horos|Art Houston|Christopher Kadish|Brian Murphy|Jay Patterson|Greg Wood|Katryn Broido|Rick Kain
title: A Gentleman's Game
